title: The Mysterious Merchant
descriptions: A weathered cart sits at the roadside, its canvas covering rippling in the breeze. The air carries scents of exotic spices and unfamiliar incense.
Behind makeshift stalls displaying curious wares, a cloaked figure watches travelers with keen, knowing eyes. Their goods seem to shift and shimmer in the light.

resolutions.title: Successful Trade
resolutions.description: The merchant opens up, revealing rare artifacts and valuable information about dangers ahead. They seem pleased to have found worthy customers.
resolutions.requirements: Persuasion DC 12 or offer fair payment for goods
resolutions.rewards: Rare magic item at 75% market price, map showing safe passage ahead, and warning about upcoming threat

resolutions.title: Cautious Exchange
resolutions.description: The merchant conducts business but remains guarded, unwilling to share deeper secrets. The transaction feels rushed and incomplete.
resolutions.rewards: Standard goods at normal prices and vague hints about the region

resolutions.title: Lost Opportunity
resolutions.description: Suspicion or hostility causes the merchant to pack up hastily. They vanish down the road, leaving only dust and the lingering scent of incense.
resolutions.requirements: Intimidation attempt, Insight check failure, or hostile action
